From a distance, this magnificent silver-colored Buddha stands on the stretching mountain. In the middle of the game, it is more magnificent, of which a thousand hands shape a total of 36 arms on the left and right sides of the "right Faming Buddha Hand", of which each arm has a hand holding "can not think about the use of magic treasure", "thousand technique wheel", these magic treasures are placed: the diamond treasure of the big gathering of wealth, the precious people gathered such as the arrow, etc. Symbolizes the characteristics of the Buddha of the world with thousands of hands and thousands of eyes; In addition, the base of the Buddha is not only a lotus seat, but also a large hall, lecture hall and Buddhist cultural relics art museum, etc. can be seen at close visits, so that the visiting people can not only take pictures, but also understand the story of religion in depth. This Buddha hall is 15 meters high, The design of 25 meters in diameter, the spacious and large span of the beamless columns, set a precedent for Taiwan's Buddha Hall.

label: 活動
review: The former British Consulate in Qing Dynasty - ㄧ red brick two-story foreign-style building is the third (and last) consular residence built by the UK in Taiwan. The appearance is elegant, unlike the closed and rigid style of the main building, this beautiful building is designed by British people and built by Chinese craftsmen. The walls are Chinese red bricks, the roof is southern Anhui red tiles, and the overall building presents a diverse exotic style. The building has red bricks, arches, cloisters and slanted roofs, which are typical British "colonial style buildings". There are living rooms, study rooms, dining rooms, rotating staircases, fireplaces and other spaces and facilities inside, some of which simulate the home situation from the time. part 2

address: China, New Taipei, Banqiao,
label: 觀光
review: Jindu Bridge - The Jindu Bridge, which is a white-type bridge, is located between Nanxing Bridge in Taipagou and Daguanqiao River. It spans the river for a maximum of 56 meters. It connects the left and right sides of the road and the Yuya Night Market. It is one of the characteristic landmarks of Taipagou. Due to the slightly dim lighting of the original bridge, after field investigation, 493 LED lights and 12 full color projection lights to improve the bridge trail and under the bridge lighting, more conducive to maintaining pedestrian safety, but also show the beauty of Jindu Bridge, the lighting changes with time, projecting colorful and gorgeous gradually layered lights, And with bicycle lane light gallery to enhance leisure fun and beautify the visual landscape.

subTitleName: 新北市立十三行博物館
address: No. 200 Museum Rd., Bali Dist, New Taipei, Taiwan
label: 觀光
review: The 13th line is located on the south bank of the junction of the Vale and Haikou in Bali District, Xinbei City. After the geologist Lin Zhaoxu confirmed the discovery of prehistoric ironmaking relics here in 1957, it was named the 13th line site. Afterwards, many archaeologists excavated here, unearthing various rich relics such as pottery, ironware, tombs and other objects. After research, it is learned that 13 pedestrians lived 1,800 years ago, belonging to Taiwan's prehistoric iron age, and are currently one of the prehistoric residents who have determined to have ironmaking technology.

review: Air Force Triple One Village - On the banks of the river at the bottom of Sane Justice South Road, covering an area of about 13,000 square meters, was listed as a historic building on the eve of demolition at the end of 2006. Since 2010, the village culture festival has been held every year. After the village is completed, it will be a demonstration field for the preservation and inheritance of Taiwan's unique village culture. On the other hand, it will combine the traditional crafts and performing arts in the village and the triple area to develop characteristic industries and create a cultural and creative development base.
